content.text: Dwight: I come from a long line of fighters. My maternal grandfather was the toughest guy I ever knew. World War II veteran. Killed twenty men then spent the rest of the war in an Allied Prison Camp. My father battled blood pressure and obesity all his life. Different kind of fight.

Jim: We're all getting excited to see this fight...the Albany branch is working right through lunch - to prevent downsizing - but Michael? He decided to extend our lunch by an hour so that we could all go down to the dojo and watch him fight Dwight...Fight!...Fight...Fight!...
Michael:Â Would I rather be feared or loved? Easy. Both. I want people to be afraid of how much they love me.
